import plugin shows similar exceptions

log in \\jinhua\shares\long\154318
Why is ther check-out under CVS? Does not make any sense. please investigate it.

Under the CVS control, when import  modifies a file (say, a configuration xmi file) from readOnly to non-readOnly using workspace's "validateEdit" method, the eclipse CVS plugin makes a backup of the original file under local CVS/base directory.

This confuses the tool, becasue the "configurations" folder allows configuration xmi files to exist under sub-directories of "configurations".

Looks like it would be hard to resolve this issue from import implementation. We may have to handle it from persistency side.
Exclude team-private files under configurations from being loaded.
